summary: VEHICLE WOULD STUTTER AND THEN STALL ON MULTIPLE OCCASIONS.  HAPPENED ONCE ON THE FIRST DAY, TWICE ON THE SECOND, AND 5 TIMES (INCLUDING 3 ON THE WAY TO THE DEALERSHIP) ON THE THIRD DAY.  THIS IS EXTREMELY UNSAFE, AS YOU ARE NEVER SURE WHEN IT IS GOING TO HAPPEN.  I WAS TOLD THAT I HAVE A "BAD THROTTLE BODY." *TR
